item.title: Sean Grayson sentencing for Sonya Massey shooting underway
item.description: Sean Grayson, who was found guilty of second-degree murder in the Sonya Massey shooting last year, is being sentenced in Springfield Thursday.

item.title: Senate Dems to Noem: Testify "without delay" after Minneapolis shootings
item.description: The Democrats' request comes days after Sen. Rand Paul announced that the heads of ICE, CBP and U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services will testify...

item.title: Senate to vote on advancing funding bills as Democrats push for ICE reforms
item.description: Democrats say they won't allow the funding package to move forward without reforms to immigration enforcement.

item.title: Days of extreme cold cause havoc for millions across U.S.
item.description: Tens of millions of Americans are experiencing bitter cold temperatures following the weekend winter storm. In New York, parts of the Hudson River, a ...

item.title: Democrats alarmed by FBI search of Fulton County election office
item.description: Fulton County confirmed the FBI executed a search warrant at its Elections Hub and Operations Center that sought "records related to 2020 elections."
